title: 你看奥斯卡颁奖典礼了吗

conversations.english: did you watch the Oscars on Sunday night?周日晚上你看奥斯卡颁奖典礼了吗?
conversations.chinese: 周日晚上你看奥斯卡颁奖典礼了吗?
conversations.reply_english: no, but I heard about that Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt didn't attend.没有,不过我听说安吉丽娜朱莉和布拉德皮特没出席.
conversations.reply_chinese: 没有,不过我听说安吉丽娜朱莉和布拉德皮特没出席.

conversations.english: I don't know why people are just mad about David Beckham. Is there really anything so fascinating with him?我真搞不懂,为什么人们那样痴迷于大卫贝克汉姆.他这人有什么神秘之处吗?
conversations.chinese: 我真搞不懂,为什么人们那样痴迷于大卫贝克汉姆.他这人有什么神秘之处吗?
conversations.reply_english: He appeals to the fans thanks to two things:his bending kicks and his good looks.我想,球迷们喜欢他的两个地方:一是他踢出的香蕉球,另一个是他长得很帅.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想,球迷们喜欢他的两个地方:一是他踢出的香蕉球,另一个是他长得很帅.

conversations.english: Guess who I saw yesterday?你猜我昨天见到谁了?
conversations.reply_english: I don't know. Who?不知道.谁啊?

title: 科比是我最喜欢的球星

conversations.english: who is your favorite NBA star?你最喜欢NBA里的哪位明星?
conversations.chinese: 你最喜欢NBA里的哪位明星?
conversations.reply_english: Kobe Bryant, of course.当然是科比啦.

title: 去要梅尔吉布森的签名吧

conversations.english: You are too picky.你太挑剔了啦。
conversations.reply_english: No, I'm not.Hey, look at that guy over there.才没有。你看那边那个人。
conversations.reply_chinese: 才没有。你看那边那个人。

title: 你最喜欢的电影明星是谁

conversations.english: Who's your favorite film star?你最喜欢的电影明星是谁？
conversations.chinese: 你最喜欢的电影明星是谁？
conversations.reply_english: Tom Hanks is always my favorite film star.我一直喜欢汤姆.汉克斯。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我一直喜欢汤姆.汉克斯。

conversations.english: have you read the feature article about Oprah Winfrey in this magazine?你看这本杂志里那篇关于奥普拉?温弗瑞的专访了吗?
conversations.chinese: 你看这本杂志里那篇关于奥普拉?温弗瑞的专访了吗?
conversations.reply_english: no, what's it about?没看呢,说了什么?

title: 指环王获得11项奥斯卡奖

conversations.english: So, have you seen all three The Lord of the Rings movies?哎,指环王三部曲你看过吗?
conversations.chinese: 哎,指环王三部曲你看过吗?
conversations.reply_english: Yes, but I didn't really like the third one at all.都看过,不过我一点儿也不喜欢第三部.
conversations.reply_chinese: 都看过,不过我一点儿也不喜欢第三部.

conversations.english: Hey, May. How about getting together for a movie tonight?嗨，阿美。今晚一起去看电影吧。
conversations.chinese: 嗨，阿美。今晚一起去看电影吧。
conversations.reply_english: Sure. What's playing?好啊。现在在上映什么电影？
conversations.reply_chinese: 好啊。现在在上映什么电影？

conversations.english: Who is that guy?那个人是谁？
conversations.reply_english: It's Clive of course. Where did you come from? Every girl knows Clive!他当然是克莱夫。你是从哪里来的啊？每个女孩都知道克莱夫啊！
conversations.reply_chinese: 他当然是克莱夫。你是从哪里来的啊？每个女孩都知道克莱夫啊！

title: 给贫困儿童捐款的慈善演出

conversations.english: Hey, Gucci. I didn't know it would be a charity show. You can see there are many collecting boxes at the entrance.嗨，古奇。我没想到这会是一场慈善演出哦。你在入口处可以看到好多捐款箱。
conversations.chinese: 嗨，古奇。我没想到这会是一场慈善演出哦。你在入口处可以看到好多捐款箱。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, I forgot to tell you this. The show is to collect money for children in need. And all the money from ticket selling will go to the Red Cross.哦，我忘记告诉你这个了。这场演出是为了给贫困儿童捐款。所有的门票收入都会转到红十字会去。
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦，我忘记告诉你这个了。这场演出是为了给贫困儿童捐款。所有的门票收入都会转到红十字会去。

title: 他可能成不了大人物会昙花一现

conversations.english: John seems to be in high cotton. He may well become a big shot.John走红起来了，他有可能成为个大人物。
conversations.chinese: John走红起来了，他有可能成为个大人物。
conversations.reply_english: I bet my button dollar that he won't. He is no more than a nine day's wonder.我敢打赌他成不了大人物，他只不过是昙花一现而已。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我敢打赌他成不了大人物，他只不过是昙花一现而已。
